statements.query:
MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(s:RestAPI) WHERE EXISTS(s.anonymous_access)
 WITH s LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE 
REMOVE s.anonymous_access, s.anonymous_actions return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
